body.name: Stove Cover - Non Stick Stove Protector for Samsung Gas Range Stove Mat With 2 Pcs Stove Gap Covers - Reusable Gas Stove Liners Washable Stove Protectors Compatible With Samsung Gas Stove
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ✅🎁【Heat Resistance】Our stove protector is an upgraded food-grade stain-resistant and silicone-resistant stove cover, environmentally friendly and hygienic. Withstands temperatures up to 315°C/600°F on gas stoves and 230°C/446°F on electric stoves. Tip: Please be careful to avoid direct contact with fire!

✅🎁【Easy to Clean & Reuse】The non-stick surface of our stove burner covers effectively repels oil and stains to keep cookware clean and hygienic. The protective oven mat is easy to clean and can be wiped down with a towel or placed directly in the dishwasher or sink to clean.

✅🎁【Attention Perfect Size】Samsung gas stove burner cover can fit perfectly on your stove, the gas stove liner is fully compatible with the gas stove, and the precise perforation is integrated with the stove. You can also cut the stove mat according to your stove details to better fit your stove.

✅🎁【What You Will Get】1 pc x Stove Top Guard + 2 pcs x Silicone Stove Counter Gap Cover + 3 pcs x Brushes. The stove cover is made of high quality to prevent burns and stains to protect the stove from stains and grease from spills or splashes.

✅🎁【Service Guarantee】The stove gap covers lid may have curled up due to being folded in the box. It is recommended to reverse curl or flatten to fit the stove, it will stay down and lay flat within seconds. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a perfect fit but does the job
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this because the description said it fit my stove model. However, that's not accurate, as the burner openings don't fit exactly the cuts that were made on the mat. Regardless I made it work and it has definitely reduced the amount of baked on splatter to the surface of my new stove. It's easy to throw on the top rack of the dishwasher or wipe down as needed. I would have given it more stars but again not an exact fit regardless if my model number was in the description.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023

reviews.reviewerName: all of it is cheap thin and useless.  Doesn't even pay to ship the crap back so guess I lose out on this deal.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy it
reviews.reviewText: cheap doeant fit 6 inches to short. Doesn't pay to send back. Not heavy duty. Useless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesnt fit my samsung stove top
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed but It seems like it could be good if the sizing was accurate but the burners dont meet the holes nor is it proper size width wise or depth wise. I haven't had a chance to test it's "cleanability" but it seems durable and sturdy enough to lift and clean ... Im going to alter it a tad and see how it goes ill take b4 and after pics and update once I've had a chance to use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have to help keep your stove clean.
reviews.reviewText: We cook a lot and purchased this as a replacement to the one we originally got for our stove a couple years ago. This is a lifesaver; so easy to clean. The last one lasted a couple of years. You have to make sure it is installed correctly (which is easy) or it will buckle and get some heat damage.Overall, a great product and a must have in your kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not too bad, especially for the price. Since it arrives tightly rolled up, it took some figuring out to get it flat. Fits well and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my new stove. Cutting the holes was a bit of a challenge and it does the job but I really wish it was a better fit. The side guards and brushes are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I just installed this, it fits my Samsung stove perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't tested its heat resistance yet, but it was very easy to flatten it out on my table for a couple hours (it arrives rolled up into a tube), and then install it under my gas burners on my Samsung 5-burner gas stove.I was skeptical, because I wasn't sure how many models of Samsung there are, and I don't even know what model my Samsung stove is, but I hate cleaning and polishing stainless steel, so I wanted to take a chance and get this cover for my stove.It is perfect!!! I'm so excited to see a future of not having to polish my stainless steel stovetop anymore, since this thing is very clearly a wipe-clean type mat.If I notice any issues with heat damage or scorching on the mat, I'll come back and edit this review with an update. But so far, 5-stars!
